Parameters.Name: GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST - OFFSET AND LIMIT

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-2-1-5 GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST - OFFSET AND LIMIT
Test.Name: Correct response with one token
Test.Description: Check GET DOOR INFO LIST – TOKEN LIST test when DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoListResponse with one token.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
ACCESSCONTROL-2-1-5 GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST - OFFSET AND LIMIT
STEP 1 - Get PACS service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePACS11/PACSService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that the DUT returned service capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get AccessPointInfo list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that result is not null STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check that tokens are unique STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Get Access Point list with limit = 1 Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Check that result is not null STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Check that limit is not exceeded STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Check response STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: Correct response with 3 tokens (MaxLimit = number of Door)

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-2-1-5 GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST - OFFSET AND LIMIT
Test.Name: Correct response with 4 tokens (MaxLimit is less than number of Door)
Test.Description: Check GET DOOR INFO LIST – TOKEN LIST test when DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoListResponse with 5 tokens, MaxLimit=3

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-2-1-5 GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST - OFFSET AND LIMIT
Test.Name: Incorrect response - equal AccessPointInfo item(Limit = MaxLimit, Offset = 0)
Test.Description: Check GET DOOR INFO LIST – TOKEN LIST test when DUT returns 2 equal AccessPointInfo items in the GetAccessPointInfoList with Limit = MaxLimit, Offset = 0

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
ACCESSCONTROL-2-1-5 GET ACCESS POINT INFO LIST - OFFSET AND LIMIT

STEP 2 - Get Service Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that the DUT returned service capabilities STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Access Point list with limit = 10 and offset =0 Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that result is not null STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check that limit is not exceeded STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Validate response received The following tokens are not unique: tokenAreaPoint2, tokenAreaPoint2 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
